summary: Improved version of the Spectral Assassin. Now Lucien is a true killing machine.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]DEADLY SPECTRAL ASSASSIN[/b][/center]
[b]INTRODUCTION[/b]
If you think the default Spectral Assassin is very weak and useless, then I recommend this mod. With some improvements that I made, now Lucien is a true killing machine.

[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]
This mod is an improved version of the Spectral Assassin. Its main features are:
[list][*] Lucien has your own Marked For Death shout;
[*] Lucien has a Paralyze spell;
[*] Lucien has your own Class;
[*] Lucien has your own Combat Style (Dual Wielding);
[*] Lucien has your own Weapon (2X Blade Of WOE);
[*] Lucian is immune to paralysis;
[*] Casting range of 100 ft;
[*] Your life time is 24 hours;[/list]
[b]INSTALLATION[/b]
Extract the file into the DATA folder (SKYRIM->DATA).

[b]UNINSTALLATION[/b]
Remove manually Deadly Spectral Assassin.esp;

[b]REQUIREMENTS[/b]
Last update.

[b]KNOWN ISSUES[/b]
None as I know. If you find any, let me know.

[b]CONFLICTS[/b]
Will conflict with any mod that changes this power.

[b]NOTES[/b]
None.

[b]PERMISSIONS[/b]
You are free to change/modify this mod. But anyway, let me know please.

Questions, comments or suggestions are welcome.
author: andbressan
